name: GO See The City
description: GO See The City is a food waste reduction platform that connects surplus food from restaurants to consumers & nonprofits. It aims to be used as a catalyst to assist the USDA & EPA in reducing food waste by 50% by 2030. The platform includes a mobile app,
one_liner: GO See The City is a food waste reduction platform that connects surplus food from restaurants to consumers & nonprofits. It aims to be used as a catalyst to assist the USDA & EPA in reducing food waste by 50% by 2030. The platform includes a mobile app,
